title: LG9-T
summary: The LG9-T is a tier 3 automatic weapon that can be manufactured with an LG5-T and 10 Narcor, or with an LG0-T, 10 Narcor and 25 Axnit. It is preceded by the LG5-T.
full_text:
LG9-T
The LG9-T is a tier 3 automatic weapon that can be manufactured with an LG5-T and 10 Narcor, or with an LG0-T, 10 Narcor and 25 Axnit. It is preceded by the LG5-T.
